title: If you're going to remove a lot of MP/5...
body:
At least keep it on Doran's ring. After getting two rings I can usually survive just fine as long as I am efficient with my spells and CS well. 

Personally I am not as upset with the removal of mana regen; I think this is an unfinished step that looks bad at first but could lead to healthier and more balance able gameplay in the future, even though it's scary right now.

Just don't change my bling, and I can live.

replies.body: Mana regen starter items would be good, and a shift to reliance on larger mana pools in the late game is where I think they're going here.

Mana regen in general is a stat that looks much stronger than it actually is, with the exception of Athene's which pretty much gives you infinite mana. 

Also, tear gaining the 25% mana refund on spells is a lot stronger than it seems as well, and rushing archangel will give similar benefits to getting a current Athene's or morellonomicon.
